about_the_game:
(Currently supported resolutions: 1920*80, 1366*768, 1080*720, 4K)

This is an 18+banned maid Cafe simulation management game. You will play the role of a maid caf é manager, managing a Cafe.

1. Gameplay:

The game controls the protagonist's movements through the directional keys on the keyboard or the left mouse button, and interacts with characters and objects in the scene through the spacebar.

Create dishes by clicking the left mouse button.

2. Content:

Every day, various types of customers come to the store, and satisfying their needs can earn them money and popularity.

There are currently 9 girls with different personalities in the game. Find a way to recruit them to work for you.

3. Features:

Although this game is a simulation management game, we hope that players will not have the top-down control of the overall situation like traditional simulation management games. But rather, it allows players to participate in the daily operation of the store as store managers, as "people". This difference is difficult to describe, so please experience it yourself in the game.

Game background:

The man is 30 years old and works as a cleaner in a coffee shop. Today is the most important day for a man in 30 years, as he decides to confess his feelings to the woman he secretly loves. A man has been giving small cookies to a woman for 100 consecutive days, and every time he sees her gladly accepting them, he believes that she must also have a good impression of him. However, the sudden scene made the man collapse. The man accidentally discovered that the woman and the store manager were having an affair. Listening to the woman's true evaluation of him, the man's heart was broken. Every word the woman said was like a knife deeply piercing the man's heart. The man unconsciously began to masturbate, which may be the only way to relieve his pain. At this moment, a loud bang suddenly appeared in the sky, "Congratulations on awakening the Pure Love God of War talent system. Congratulations on obtaining the new skill: Money Eye "," Skill description; can see the other party's deposit. "The man heard a sound similar to the system prompt in the game. From then on, the fate of men began to change.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, players can rape female employees, and after mastering their secrets, they can also threaten female employees with oral sex, foot sex, and sexual intercourse. When the male protagonist fantasizes and masturbates, there are a few scenes of BDSM (bondage, abuse).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: DirectX 11+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 680 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
